Translations.Text: O popol vi est unu bezon DI while DI est en ne bezon anyone plej Praiseworthy
Li vol Li get rid da vi substitute neo creation
This ne est tro difficult por DI

Ne anim port pek another anim. Anim loaded pek implores another bor part de its load neni ali anim port any part de gxi ecx ili rilat! Nur popol heed your warnings est those reverence their Lord eben when sol en their privacy observ Kontakt Prayers (Salat)! Whoever purifies his anim does tial his own bon Al DI est final destiny
Blind seer ne est egal
Nor est darkness light
Nor est coolness de shade hejt sun
Nor est viv dead DI kauxz whomever Li vol auxd. Vi ne far hearers those graves
Vi est ne plur than warner
Ni send vi truth bearer bon news tro warner. Cxiu community ricev warner
Se ili disbelieve vi those antaux them ankaux disbelieved Their messengers ir them klar proofs Psalm enlightening scriptures
Subsequently mi pun those disbelieved kiel terrible est My retribution
Vi ne realize DI send down cxiel akv whereby ni produkt Do frukt de various kolor? Eben mont hav different kolor; peaks est blank rugx kelk ali kolor. ravens est nigr
Ankaux popol best livestock ven various kolor. This est popol ver reverence DI est those est knowledgeable. DI est Almighty Forgiving
Surely those recite libr DI observ Kontakt Prayers (Salat) our provisions them ili spend - secretly publicly - engaged investment neniam perd
Li recompense them generously multiply His blessings them! Li Forgiving Appreciative
ki ni revealed vi en this scripture est truth consummating all previous scriptures! DI est fully Cognizant DE His servants Seer

Ni pas scripture generaci generaci, ni allowed whomever ni chose our servants ricev gxi! Subsequently kelk da them wronged their anim others upheld gxi nur part de temp while others est eager work righteousness en accordance kun di testament this est greatest triumf
Ili enter gxarden Eden ili ornam bracelets de or perl their garments gxi far silk
Ili dir Lauxd DI removing all our worries Our Lord Forgiving Appreciative
Li admitted us abode etern bliss His grace Neniam do ni ted herein neniam do ni lac
As por those disbelieve ili incurred fajr Infer kie ili neniam fin death nor est retribution ever commuted them. Ni tiel requite des unappreciative

Ili scream therein Our Lord vi get us out da here ni work righteousness works ni uz do ni ne don vi life-long sxanc continuous reminders those pren heed Vi ne ricev warner? Do gust (consequences). transgressors hav ne 1 help them
DI est Knower future DE heavens TER. Li est Knower all innermost thoughts

Li est Unu far vi inheritors ter. Subsequently whoever chooses disbelieve does tial his own detriment. disbelief disbelievers nur eg their Lord's abhorrence them. disbelief disbelievers plongx them profund loss

Dir Konsider idols vi set DI; montr me ki sur ter ili hav kre. ili own any partnership heavens? Ni don them libr hav wherein tie est ne dub? Ja ki transgressors promes 1 another est ne plur than iluzi
